languages.text: "Ты говоришь так, будто мир незыблем и никто из нас не может ничего изменить к лучшему".
"You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."
languages.original_text: "Ты говоришь так, будто мир незыблем и никто из нас не может ничего изменить к лучшему".

traits.locale_text: "You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."
"You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."
"You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."
"You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."
"You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."

languages.text: “听你说来，就好像这个世界一成不变。没有人能改变任何事情，也没有人能让它变得更好。”
languages.original_text: "You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."

traits.locale_text: “听你说来，就好像这个世界一成不变。没有人能改变任何事情，也没有人能让它变得更好。”

languages.text: «Habla como si el curso de los acontecimientos estuviera escrito y no pudiéramos hacer nada por cambiarlo a mejor».
languages.original_text: "You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."

traits.locale_text: «Habla como si el curso de los acontecimientos estuviera escrito y no pudiéramos hacer nada por cambiarlo a mejor».

languages.text: 「お前はまるで世界が確定していて、{mf|俺|私}たちは誰一人として何ら良い方向に変えることができないかのように話すのだな」
languages.original_text: "You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はまるで世界が確定していて、{mf|俺|私}たちは誰一人として何ら良い方向に変えることができないかのように話すのだな」

languages.text: "Ihr redet, als wäre die Welt in Stein gemeißelt, und niemand von uns könnte sie zum Besseren verändern."
languages.original_text: "You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr redet, als wäre die Welt in Stein gemeißelt, und niemand von uns könnte sie zum Besseren verändern."

languages.text: « Vous parlez comme si tout était gravé dans le marbre et que personne ne pouvait changer quoi que ce soit pour rendre le monde meilleur. »
languages.original_text: "You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."

traits.locale_text: « Vous parlez comme si tout était gravé dans le marbre et que personne ne pouvait changer quoi que ce soit pour rendre le monde meilleur. »

languages.text: "Dünya değiştirilmezmiş, daha iyi hâle getirmek için hiçbirimizin elinden bir şey gelmezmiş gibi konuşuyorsun."
languages.original_text: "You speak as if the world is set in stone and none of us can change anything for the better."
